sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_06bead482f1211107f79877cf699b605
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allows users with read access to task record to see its attachment security configurations.</description><name>u_attachment_security_criteria</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[var grRecord = new GlideRecord(current.u_attachment.table_name); answer = grRecord.get(current.u_attachment.table_sys_id) ? grRecord.canRead() : false;]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-27 20:22:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>06bead482f1211107f79877cf699b605</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_attachment_security_criteria</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_06bead482f1211107f79877cf699b605</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-27 20:22:24</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_db_object"><sys_db_object action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access/><actions_access>true</actions_access><alter_access>true</alter_access><caller_access/><client_scripts_access>true</client_scripts_access><configuration_access>false</configuration_access><create_access>true</create_access><create_access_controls>false</create_access_controls><delete_access>false</delete_access><extension_model/><is_extendable>false</is_extendable><label>Attachment Security Criterias</label><live_feed_enabled>false</live_feed_enabled><name>u_attachment_security_criteria</name><number_ref/><provider_class/><read_access>true</read_access><scriptable_table>false</scriptable_table><super_class/><sys_class_code/><sys_class_name>sys_db_object</sys_class_name><sys_class_path/><sys_created_by>grafdigital</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 16:32:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>b22e085a2f75111061395fd62799b63a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attachment Security Criterias</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_db_object_b22e085a2f75111061395fd62799b63a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>grafdigital</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 16:32:20</sys_updated_on><update_access>true</update_access><user_role/><ws_access>true</ws_access></sys_db_object></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_554e4c9a2f75111061395fd62799b6b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_attachment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Create Attachment Security Record</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var configs = gs.getProperty('attachment.ucsecurity.tablesanddefaults').split('\n');
	var config = configs.filter(function(i) { return i.startsWith(current.table_name + '|'); }).map(function(i) { return i.split('|'); })[0];
	if(config) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_attachment_security_criteria');
		gr.initialize();
		gr.u_attachment = current.getUniqueValue();
		gr.u_user_criteria = config[1];
		gr.insert();
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 16:35:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>554e4c9a2f75111061395fd62799b6b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Attachment Security Record</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_554e4c9a2f75111061395fd62799b6b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-27 20:17:09</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=554e4c9a2f75111061395fd62799b6b3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_relationship_c101d85e2f75111061395fd62799b6eb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>task</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>u_attachment_security_criteria</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Attachment Security</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	current.addQuery('u_attachment.table_sys_id', parent.sys_id);

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field/><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 16:46:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>c101d85e2f75111061395fd62799b6eb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attachment Security</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_c101d85e2f75111061395fd62799b6eb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 16:46:14</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c101d85e2f75111061395fd62799b6eb"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_0bcf23740a6a38d400c7e02590038464
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow read for records in sys_attachment, if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>sys_attachment</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('u_attachment_security_criteria');
if(gr.get('u_attachment', current.getUniqueValue())) {
	answer = sn_uc.UserCriteriaLoader.userMatches(gs.getUserID(), [gr.u_user_criteria.toString()])
} else
	answer = new global.AttachmentSecurity().canRead(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>james.capaldo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2009-09-30 16:41:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>0bcf23740a6a38d400c7e02590038464</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sys_attachment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Contextual Security Rules" source="com.glide.acl.service">9f59807921920110a866589604c20d6a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_0bcf23740a6a38d400c7e02590038464</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-09 16:42:41</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_048865042f1211107f79877cf699b649
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Specify which tables should be affected by the user criteria attachment security business rule.
If enabled, attachment security records with the configured default criteria will be created for every new sys_attachment record.

Format (Newline delimited):
table_name|default_user_criteria_sys_id</description><ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>attachment.ucsecurity.tablesanddefaults</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>grafdigital</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-27 20:09:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>048865042f1211107f79877cf699b649</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>attachment.ucsecurity.tablesanddefaults</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_048865042f1211107f79877cf699b649</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>grafdigital</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-27 20:09:19</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>incident|fb1166d64fff0200086eeed18110c7ab</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=048865042f1211107f79877cf699b649"/></record_update>
